main event: A bright light was observed at Kindley AFB, Bermuda, emitting a pulsating light and rapidly moving east before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was sighted at 30-40' AGL, It was turning or rotating, The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute, The object emitted a light that changed from orange to blue-white, There were no photographs of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light emitting a pulsating light
